categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Loell was a female Human Sith apprentice who was stationed on Balmorra during the Great Galactic War, the Cold War, and the Galactic War together with her master Sith Lord Tharsis. During the liberation of Balmorra she was located by Balmorran resistance and then killed by a Republic spacer who was searching for her master.
